generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Entity LookAtActorBaseDefinition
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Causes the entity to look at nearby actors that match the specified filter criteria.

fields.title: Angle Of View Horizontal
fields.description: The angle in degrees that the mob can see rotated on the Y-axis (left-right).

fields.title: Angle Of View Vertical
fields.description: The angle in degrees that the mob can see rotated on the X-axis (up-down).

fields.title: Look Distance
fields.description: The distance in blocks from which the entity will look at the nearest entity.

fields.title: Look Time
fields.description: Time range to look at the nearest entity.

fields.title: Probability
fields.description: The probability of looking at the target. A value of 1.00 is 100%.
